/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, providing a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is flanked by lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the sides of the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a smattering of clouds adding depth to the vista. The image is bathed in the soft light of day, highlighting the colors and details of the scene.
